column2: Allah may chose you. The current caliph isn't the right person, you could spread the faith better.
May you aren't chosen by Allah. The current caliph is the right person, you couldn't do it as good as [rightful_religious_head_scope.GetSheHe].
The two leader of the war want to settle the question that who is the rightful caliph.
Has same or higher rank than the current caliph.
